Actions.Name: Razor Wind
Actions.Description: Repeat the following effect three times:
Actions.Effect: Dash 1, then deal 2 damage to all adjacent foes. Cannot pass through a space more than once during this movement.

Interrupts.Name: Twirl
Interrupts.Trigger: The Twinsoul takes damage from an ability.
Interrupts.Effect: The Twinsoul teleports 3 after the ability resolves, then gains evasion until the end of its next turn.
